definition[0]: used when you do not understand what someone is trying to say
example[0]: ‘You’ll be careful won’t you?’ ‘What do you mean?’
definition[1]: used when you are very surprised or annoyed by what someone has just said
example[1]: What do you mean, you’ve cancelled the trip?
example[2]: What do you mean by that?
definition[2]: used when you are very annoyed by what someone has just done
example[3]: What do you mean by calling me at this time of night?
